EmailTemplate.name: 201910_NBAA_Breakout_Sessions_MC.201910_Email_Invite_NBAA_Breakout_Sessions_amr.
EmailTemplate.subject: Heading to NBAA? Catch these Epic Honeywell Breakout Sessions
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> NBAA 2019 is just around the corner which means it’s time for another exciting breakout session lineup from Honeywell GoDirect. From new flight planning technology, to the first look at an integrated connectivity dashboard to presentations from key partners Honeywell has a loaded program for you to enjoy.
Don’t miss these FREE exciting sessions that touch on new topics, trends and technology in the business aviation marketplace.
Check out our lineup and full descriptions online at our breakout session page. ${ctaLinkText} <[[${ctaLink}]]> © {{my.year}} Honeywell International Inc. This message was sent to {{lead.Email Address:default=NA}}. If you don't want to receive these emails from Honeywell in the future, you can edit your profile <[[]]> or unsubscribe <[[https://explore.honeywell.com/Unsubscribepage.html]]>.
